subject: RE: Quick question re colour of page header
preview: Hi Lizzy, Ok sure, confirming we have added the below links to the main navigation.

full_threads.body:
Hi Lizzy, 

Ok sure, confirming we have added the below links to the main navigation.

Hi Heath,

Brilliant, thanks! If you could per the following instructions that would be amazing 😊

For People with MS

Add a link to here (https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/) in the dropdown homepage nav bar 'For people with MS' called Adapting Your Lifestyle Guide(This would sit directly below the link to Physical Activity Guide)



For Health Professionals

Add a link to here (https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/) in the dropdown homepage nav bar 'For researchers' called Modifiable Lifestyle Factors Guide(This would sit directly below the link to Conferences And Workshops)



Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy, 

Yes they are live and ready to go. Did you want us to add the land page: https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/ to the main navigation at all?

Hi Heath,

All good - thanks for confirming the update.

Just triple checking these pages are all live now right? (not in staging or anything)

Thanks

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy, 

Apologies, we didn't see that previously. Confirming we have now added the extra fields: 
https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/

Hi,

Thanks for the vid - will check that out shortly.

Thanks for renaming the forms too - was hoping you guys could update the health professionals form too per the attached request - I'm happy to update myself but don't want to mess anything up with the forms just before the launch.

Cheers,

Lizzy

Hi Lizzy, 

We have renamed the forms as requested. Regarding the tracking, you can see how many times the PDF's have been downloaded automatically. Here is a quick how to video:
https://www.loom.com/share/cbc9dbd3917e408289ca10d45fe9dc46

Let me know if that's what you are after?

@heath done changing the title of the forms. Kindly check the outstanding task below, Thanks!

Outstanding task:
final massive favour - we launch Thursday morning - would it be possible for you to set up event tracking on the various CTA buttons (on the master landing page and on the two sub-pages)? If there's any way you could loom video it so we can try doing this ourselves next time that would be amazing.

Hi,

Just checking in on this - would it be possible to make the update to the form on the health professionals page per the request below?

Also, just had a quick look in the back-end and was hoping these two forms could be updated to mirror the pages they come from:

Physical Activity: A Guide For People with MS - A should be called: Modifiable Lifestyle Guide - Health Professionals

Physical Activity: A Guide For People with MS - B should be called: Modifiable Lifestyle Guide - People with MS

Rather than the current naming (I would be happy to do it but don't want to mess anything up).



Also, final massive favour - we launch Thursday morning - would it be possible for you to set up event tracking on the various CTA buttons (on the master landing page and on the two sub-pages)? If there's any way you could loom video it so we can try doing this ourselves next time that would be amazing.

Thanks I advance

Lizzy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Lizzy,

Everything looks good on both pages. Let us know if there are tweaks that we need to do. Cheers!

Hi Rica,

Brilliant - thanks.

I've added the embed code myself - when copying and pasting directly from Issuu it was appearing really tiny on our pages so I looked at the difference between the code and could see this was missing: id="publication-iframe">

Original code for Health Professionals Version (in red is what I added)

<iframe allowfullscreen allow="fullscreen" style="border:none;width:100%;height:326px;" src="//e.issuu.com/embed.html?backgroundColor=%23ffffff&backgroundColorFullscreen=%23ffffff&d=modifiable_lifestyle_factors_and_ms_-_a_guide_for_&doAutoflipPages=true&hideIssuuLogo=true&hideShareButton=true&pageLayout=singlePage&u=msresearchaustralia" id="publication-iframe"></iframe>

Original code for People with MS Version (in red is what I added)

<iframe allowfullscreen allow="fullscreen" style="border:none;width:100%;height:326px;" src="//e.issuu.com/embed.html?backgroundColor=%23ffffff&backgroundColorFullscreen=%23ffffff&d=adapting_your_lifestlye_-_a_guide_for_people_with_&doAutoflipPages=true&hideIssuuLogo=true&hideShareButton=true&pageLayout=singlePage&u=msresearchaustralia" id="publication-iframe"></iframe>

Once I included that into the HTML it now appears to be displaying as expected but would appreciate if you could check if what I've done is correct…

Testing the journey and automated emails now so will let you know if any tweaks to that once tested.

Thanks

Lizzy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body: Logged 30 mins to harvest
@jona total of 30 minutes, thanks!

Hi Lizzy,

Sure, confirming that we have already made the updates and ready for you to review.

Here are the links:
https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/guide/
https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/guide/

Once ready, please provide us the embedded code for the PDFs from Issuu so we can update it on both pages mentioned. Please let us know if you would like further changes.
@manuel thanks, i will work on the rest.
@rica done updates the links and body text. @jona 10min task.

@manuel done updating the automated email notification of the forms (Physical Activity: A Guide For People With MS - A and Physical Activity: A Guide For People With MS - B).

Outstanding Task:
  1. Health Professionalsversion - Extra page that I can host the embedded health professionals guide on (that you get to when you complete the form on this page> https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/)
    EXTRA PAGE TO BE CALLED: https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/guide/ (visually will look similar to this > https://msra.org.au/physical-activity-a-guide-for-people-with-ms/?physical_id=34170)
  2. People with MS version - Extra page that I can host the embedded people with MS guide on (that you get to when you complete the form on this page> https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/
    EXTRA PAGE TO BE CALLED:
https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/guide/ (visually will look similar to this > https://msra.org.au/physical-activity-a-guide-for-people-with-ms/?physical_id=34170)
@manuel kindly check this, thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Amazing, thank you!

Due to lots of last minute changes to the documents themselves, I also need to now brief two additional pages that will host embedded versions of our PDFs from Issuu so that I can update versions of the PDF and not affect the journey on our site (the journey will be like what we did with the Physical Activity Guide pages).

Please could you add the following two pages (they just need to have the same header as the form pages but be blank with the option to add an embed code):

  1. Health Professionalsversion - Extra page that I can host the embedded health professionals guide on (that you get to when you complete the form on this page> https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/)
    EXTRA PAGE TO BE CALLED: https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/health-professionals/guide/ (visually will look similar to this > https://msra.org.au/physical-activity-a-guide-for-people-with-ms/?physical_id=34170)

  2. People with MS version - Extra page that I can host the embedded people with MS guide on (that you get to when you complete the form on this page> https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/

EXTRA PAGE TO BE CALLED: https://msra.org.au/modifiable-lifestyle-guide-2020/for-people-with-ms/guide/ (visually will look similar to this > https://msra.org.au/physical-activity-a-guide-for-people-with-ms/?physical_id=34170)

Additionally the automated emails that are sent from each form completion page need to be updated - see attached word doc.

Thanks

Lizzy

attachments.filename: Automated email copy for MLF campaign.docx

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

Hi Lizzy,

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
